scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && webpack --config webpack.config.js && node ./src/inline.js && cp ./src/pop.html ./dist/pop.html && cp ./src/popup.js ./dist/popup.js && cp ./src/roboto-mono.ttf ./dist/roboto-mono.ttf && cp ./src/cancel.png ./dist/cancel.png && cp ./src/left-arrow.png ./dist/left-arrow.png && cp ./src/settings-cog.png ./dist/settings-cog.png && cp ./src/info.png ./dist/info.png
